title: Wolf Chasm
description: Caught in a snowstorm with her horse, Clare’s only hope of survival is to take shelter in a cave. Unfortunately, the cave is already home to a pack of wolves. The three puppies are no threat, and neither is their uncle who is injured. However, the very protective mother wolf isn’t one bit helpless. In fact, she is convinced that Clare will kill her puppies - unless she attacks first!
author: Angela Dorsey
